fields.summary: CLONE - for 4.1 - Describing load balancers immediately after deregistering an instance fails

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When load balancers are listed immediately after deregistering an instance from a load balancer then a 500 error occurs: {code} # eulb-deregister-instances-from-lb --instances i-caa1b5b2 Balancer1; Linux 2.6.32-431.11.2.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.2.0-pre3 requests/1.1.0 2014-05-16 19:00:48,239 DEBUG ELB request data: AWSAccessKeyId: AKIOFSL6GNWHAYZGPGXE 2014-05-16 19:00:48,239 DEBUG ELB request data: Action: DescribeLoadBalancers 2014-05-16 19:00:48,239 DEBUG ELB request data: Signature: XzpE8bR5XvPa1UxOopfSCcpnkZou120IqJfxCbfHU/g= 2014-05-16 19:00:48,239 DEBUG ELB request data: SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256 2014-05-16 19:00:48,239 DEBUG ELB request data: SignatureVersion: 2 2014-05-16 19:00:48,239 DEBUG ELB request data: Timestamp: 2014-05-17T02:00:48Z 2014-05-16 19:00:48,239 DEBUG ELB request data: Version: 2012-06-01 2014-05-16 19:00:48,335 DEBUG ELB response time: 0.095 seconds 2014-05-16 19:00:48,335 ERROR ELB response status: 500 2014-05-16 19:00:48,336 DEBUG ELB response header: content-length: 370 2014-05-16 19:00:48,336 DEBUG ELB response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 2014-05-16 19:00:49,606 DEBUG DescribeLoadBalancers -- response content -- Balancer1Balancer1-150564846067.lb.c-06.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.comHTTP803001PARTI00TCP:300130523150564846067euca-internal-150564846067-Balancer12014-05-17T01:46:29.78Za17d8288-5b55-474f-995d-fb43b121d2d7 2014-05-16 19:00:49,607 DEBUG DescribeLoadBalancers -- end of response content -- LOAD_BALANCER Balancer1 Balancer1-150564846067.lb.c-06.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com 2014-05-17T01:46:29.78Z {code} Note that euca2ools invokes the action again after the initial 500 error. The error that occurs is: {code} Receiver DescribeLoadBalancersType Unable to find com.eucalyptus.loadbalancing.LoadBalancerBackendInstance with id 8aef81a945f84284014607df8f051c5e 684aade3-e6c4-4a7a-8536-9d883b7e6066 {code}
fields.summary: Describing load balancers immediately after deregistering an instance fails

comments.body: I should have noted in the description that this can break tools that perform a describe after deleting an ELB which is likely a common pattern.

Fix Verified

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.0.1
Release     : 0.0.22219.22.20140713git7ec100e.el6

Attempted several attempts and did not have 500 error for describe after de-register an instance from an ELB.

example
{code}
[root@d-32 ~]# eulb-deregister-instances-from-lb --instances i-00755D10 tb-elb; eulb-describe-lbs --debug
INSTANCE	i-A2B5ADB6
